gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 108, Pistons 90
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Pistons, 108-90. Trey Jamison (17 points, career-high 13 rebounds) and Scotty Pippen Jr. (16 points, seven assists) led Memphis as GG Jackson added 15 points, three rebounds, and four assists. Jaden Ivey led Detroit with 31 points and six 3PM as Jalen Duren added 17 points and 10 rebounds.
